import React from "react" import PropTypes from "prop-types" import image from "../../../assets/images/paneer.avif"; import "../../../assets/stylesheets/cart_items/addresses.css" const CartItems = (props) => { return (
Add a delivery address
You seem to be in the new location
{props.addresses.map((address, index) => (
Add address
{address.door_number}, {address.street_area},
{address.city},
{address.state},
{address.zipcode}.
DELIVER HERE
))}
Payment
) } export default CartItems
